hero.title: Manage Your Clipboard Like a Pro
hero.description: ClipTrack is the intelligent clipboard manager that helps you boost your productivity and organize your digital life.

smartHistory.title: Smart Clipboard History
smartHistory.description: Access your entire clipboard history with ease and never lose important information again.

powerfulSearch.title: Powerful Search
powerfulSearch.description: Find any copied item instantly with our advanced search functionality.

scheduledClips.title: Scheduled Clips
scheduledClips.description: Schedule your clips to be available at the right time, enhancing your workflow.

multiLanguage.title: Multi-language Support
multiLanguage.description: Use ClipTrack in your preferred language with our international language support.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Enjoy ClipTrack in light or dark mode for comfortable use in any environment.

step1.title: Install ClipTrack
step1.description: Download and install ClipTrack on your device.

step2.title: Copy as Usual
step2.description: Use your device normally. ClipTrack works silently in the background.

step3.title: Access Your Clips
step3.description: Open ClipTrack anytime to view, search, and manage your clipboard history.

download.title: Ready to Boost Your Productivity?
download.description: Download ClipTrack now and start managing your clipboard like a pro.
download.platforms: Available for Windows, macOS, and Linux

support.title: Support Our Work
support.description: If you find ClipTrack useful, consider supporting our work. Your contribution helps us maintain and improve the app.
